title: A letter written out of the countrey to a person of quality in the city who took offence at the late sermon of Dr. Stillingfleet, Dean of S. Pauls, before the Lord Mayor
author: Howe, John, 1630-1705.
notes: Attributed to John Howe. Cf. McAlpin Coll., Halkett & Laing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
